name: Backup Database
author: WpProKing

sections.description:
Pro Version

  • http://wpallbackup.com
  • http://wpallbackup.com/documentation/

We offer the easiest way to backup your WordPress based website or blog. You can backup your database just on click.them ** delivered via Dropbox,FTP **, you can sleep easy knowing you’re protected.

Features

  • allows you easily to backup your core WordPress database tables. You may also backup other tables in the same database.
  • One click backup – Create database backup on sigle button click
  • Unlimited backup – create as many backups as you want, there is no limit
  • Backup on same server
  • Scheduled Supports both manual and automated (scheduled) backups: daily, weekly, or monthly.
  • Email Notification
  • Support ZipArchive for createing backup File
  • FTP BackupStore Backup on your FTP/SFTP Server
  • DropBox Backup -Option for Store your Backup on DropBox.
  • Limit Number of Backup
  • Download backup – download your backup files for migration
  • Manage backup – delete backups, view backup or Download log
  • Backup customization – you choose which tabale you want to backup

Get Pro Features

  • http://wpallbackup.com

Documentation

  • http://wpallbackup.com/documentation/

Create backup and restore your entire site at will, complete with FTP & S3 integration,Google Drive, Dropbox

Pro Features

  • Complete Backup
  • Create Database Backup easily on single click.
  • Autobackup Backup automatically on a repeating schedule
  • Manual backup
  • Multisite compatible
  • Backup entire site
  • Exclude specific folders and files
  • Downloadable log files
  • Simple one-click restore
  • Set number of backups to store
  • Automatically remove oldest backup
  • Multiple storage destinations
  • FTP integration
  • Dropbox integration
  • Google drive integration
  • Amazon s3 integration
  • Email Notification
  • Reporting- Sends emailed backups and backup reports to any email addresses
  • ZipArchive
  • Select Backup Type: Only Database,Only Files, Complete Backup
  • Easy To Install(Very easy to use)
  • PclZip
  • Clone Site
  • Move Site
  • Change Backup folder name
  • Uses zip and mysqldump for faster back ups if they are available.
  • Exclude Tables from your back ups.
  • Support

Get Pro Version ‘WP ALL BACKUP ‘ Plugin

  • http://www.wpallbackup.com
  • http://www.wpallbackup.com/documentation/

Support

Feedback Or Any suggestion drop mail to
wpallbackup@gmail.com
sections.installation:
Installation of Database Backup

  1. Upload Backup Database to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Now You can see the Backup Database Menu
  4. Enjoy!

Feedback

wpallbackup@gmail.com

Support

http://www.wpallbackup.com/support

  • compatible with WordPress Version 4.7.3

4.5.1

  • Fixed Bug

  • Feature:Added option for backup other tables in the same database.

  • Feature:Change UI Design
  • Feature:Added Menu for Backup Database
  • Feature:FTP Backup -Option for Store your Backup on FTP/SFTP Server
  • Feature:Scheduled automated backups: daily, weekly, or monthly.
  • Feature:Email Notification.
  • Feature:Support ZipArchive for createing backup File
  • Feature:Limit Number of backup
  • Imporved performance

  • Feature:DropBox Backup -Option for Store your Backup on DropBox

3.0

  • Feature:Added pro version support

2.0

  • Feature:User can manage the backup from the dashboard

  • Bug Fixed

1.1

  • Added Db info
  • Added Table info

1.0

  • initial Version
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Installation of Database Backup

  1. Upload Backup Database to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Now You can see the Backup Database Menu
  4. Enjoy!

Feedback

wpallbackup@gmail.com

Support

http://www.wpallbackup.com/support
